segments.text: Hi ! It's still seven o'clock . Are you crazy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got the information that there is a killer sale at the shopping mall near our block . Get up and I will wait for you at the gate of our flat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Every time when you glimpse some stylish clothes , you change into another person .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No wonder you are named shopaholic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I am not a shopaholic , but a super shopaholic . And I really enjoy smelling the gorgeous clothes and new bags .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a moment . And you can check where other sales are .
segments.speaker: S1
